publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3561 Ms Margo MacDonald: Ability of Holyrood Progress Group-That the Parliament has no confidence in the ability of the Holyrood Progress Group to achieve any of its own declared aims which are to deal competently with question and answer sessions for MSPs, monitor and report on the progress of the Holyrood project and control expenditure so as to ensure that the Parliament takes delivery of a world-class building on budget and on time, and resolves to exert a greater measure of client control over the project by dissolving the group and appointing an experienced building industry professional to represent the Parliament and the public interest on the Holyrood Project Team in place of the current Project Director.
S1M-3561 Ability of Holyrood Progress Group (lodged on 11 November 2002) Alex Neil*

S1M-3561 Ms Margo MacDonald: Ability of Holyrood Progress Group-That the Parliament has no confidence in the ability of the Holyrood Progress Group to achieve any of its own declared aims which are to deal competently with question and answer sessions for MSPs, monitor and report on the progress of the Holyrood project and control expenditure so as to ensure that the Parliament takes delivery of a world-class building on budget and on time, and resolves to exert a greater measure of client control over the project by dissolving the group and appointing an experienced building industry professional to represent the Parliament and the public interest on the Holyrood Project Team in place of the current Project Director.
S1M-3561 Ability of Holyrood Progress Group (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3561 Ability of Holyrood Progress Group (lodged on 11 November 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3561 Ability of Holyrood Progress Group (lodged on 11 November 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
